PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_DuctSegmentOccurrence
PropertySetDef.Definition: Duct segment occurrence attributes attached to an instance of IfcDuctSegment.

PropertyDef.Name: InteriorRoughnessCoefficient
PropertyDef.Definition: The interior roughness of the duct fitting material.

DefinitionAliases.DefinitionAlias: ダクト継手材料の内面粗さ

PropertyDef.Name: HasLiner
PropertyDef.Definition: TRUE if the fitting has interior duct insulating lining, FALSE if it does not.

DefinitionAliases.DefinitionAlias: 内貼り保温ダクト内面にあるときにTRUE。無い時にFALSE

PropertyDef.Name: Color
PropertyDef.Definition:
The color of the duct segment.
Note: This is typically used for any duct segments with a painted surface which is not otherwise specified as a covering.

DefinitionAliases.DefinitionAlias: ダクト継手の色 メモ：塗装されているときに使用される。他の場合は仕上げとして定義

PsetDefinitionAliases.PsetDefinitionAlias: IfcDuctSegmentの値に関連づいたダクト直管の属性。
